attributes.additional_details:
People who have mental health problems enjoy recreational driving and controlling the vehicle such as a car and it helps them keep motivated to do their jobs. If human operated cars get banned then more people will develop mental Health problems. 

Banning human operated vehicles such as cars will damage peoples mental health and therefore will make more people unemployed and therefore this will damage the UK economy.
attributes.background: Driving is the only thing left that some people enjoy in life and it would be wrong to take away the right to have fun in an human operated vehicle.

rejection.details:
The Government has given no indication that it plans to ban human operated vehicles, and we can only accept petitions that call for a change to Government policy.

You could start a petition calling for restrictions to driverless vehicles, if that is what you want to happen.
